question: Which country was the location of the event "St. Jean Bosco massacre"?
explanation: Haiti was the location of the event "St. Jean Bosco massacre". The St. Jean Bosco massacre took place in Haiti on 11 September 1988. At least 13 people were killed and around 80 wounded in a three-hour assault on the Saint-Jean Bosco church in Port-au-Prince, which saw the church burned down.
